Html:
Hello,

Radioman, I can't thank you enough for this great component. Especially rotate functionality is awesome.

I have a problem with ArcGis map's projection. I would like to have ArcGis map which is viewed from straight above like this:

http://www.arcgis.com/home/webmap/viewer.html?webmap=7990d7ea55204450b8110d57e20c99ab

So I want to get rid of that 3D look, which that current PlateCarreeProjection have. I have tried MercatorProjection which corrects the 3D problem but then the map is too small to view whole world. Could please help me? I am using Windows Forms version.
You were fast. :) Thank you very much.
